title: divine divinity.rpg game
description: Divine Divinity is Larian Studios? hot PC computer role-playing game which has been receiving universal praise. The game takes the player on a fantastic quest in a land torn apart by corruption and dark magic. Throughout his journeys the player gets the chance to develop his character as one of six character types, and meet a variety of people and fantastical beings. By combining the best features of the RPG genre, and introducing a lot of new features, Divine Divinity appeals to both hard-core and new RPG players.
